languages.text: "Я не заключаю сделок и, упаси Император, не собираюсь отдавать вам распоряжения — это было бы покушением на ваши привилегии. Я лишь даю благожелательные рекомендации и рассчитываю, что в момент, когда Простору будет угрожать опасность, вы оторветесь от своих дел и прислушаетесь к ним".

traits.locale_text: "Не сделки — сотрудничества. Я не желаю от вас чего-то конкретного здесь и сейчас. Лишь рассчитываю, что ваш слух будет чуток к моим... пожеланиям, которые могут возникнуть позже. Что же касается вашей персоны — я всегда видел в династии фон Валанциус большой потенциал. Надеюсь не разочароваться".

languages.text: "I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Expanse finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."
languages.original_text: "Я не заключаю сделок и, упаси Император, не собираюсь отдавать вам распоряжения — это было бы покушением на ваши привилегии. Я лишь даю благожелательные рекомендации и рассчитываю, что в момент, когда Простору будет угрожать опасность, вы оторветесь от своих дел и прислушаетесь к ним".

traits.locale_text: "I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Koronus finds itself in danger, you will take a break from your everyday affairs and listen to them."

"I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Koronus finds itself in danger, you will take a break from your everyday affairs and listen to them."

"I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Koronus finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

"I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Koronus finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

"I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Expanse finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

languages.text: 「取引などしない。また、お前に命じること…つまり、自由開拓者の特権を侵すことは皇帝によって禁じられている。私はただ善意から提案し、受けてもらえるよう期待するのみだ。エクスパンスが危機にさらされているこの時に、お前は自分のことを脇に置いて提案を心に留めておくと」
languages.original_text: "I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Expanse finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

traits.locale_text: 「取引などしない。また、お前に命じること…つまり、自由開拓者の特権を侵すことは皇帝によって禁じられている。私はただ善意から提案し、受けてもらえるよう期待するのみだ。エクスパンスが危機にさらされているこの時に、お前は自分のことを脇に置いて提案を心に留めておくと」

languages.original_text: "I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Expanse finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

languages.text: “我不是来谈买卖的。帝皇禁止我对你下命令，因为这么做相当于侵犯你的特权。因此，我只是来提出一些善意的忠告：我希望在科罗努斯扩区陷入危机时，你能暂时放下自己的事情，按照我的忠告行事。”
languages.original_text: "I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Expanse finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

traits.locale_text: “我不是来谈买卖的。帝皇禁止我对你下命令，因为这么做相当于侵犯你的特权。因此，我只是来提出一些善意的忠告：我希望在科罗努斯扩区陷入危机时，你能暂时放下自己的事情，按照我的忠告行事。”

languages.text: «No hago tratos, y tampoco le daré órdenes, puesto que vulneraría los privilegios que el Emperador le ha dado. Me limito a ofrecerle recomendaciones bien intencionadas y a esperar que cuando la Extensión corra peligro abandone sus asuntos para ayudar».
languages.original_text: "I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Expanse finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

traits.locale_text: «No hago tratos, y tampoco le daré órdenes, puesto que vulneraría los privilegios que el Emperador le ha dado. Me limito a ofrecerle recomendaciones bien intencionadas y a esperar que cuando la Extensión corra peligro abandone sus asuntos para ayudar».

languages.text: « Je ne conclus pas de marché, et jamais je ne me permettrais d'empiéter sur vos privilèges en vous donnant des ordres. Je ne fais que vous offrir des recommandations dans l'espoir que vous accourrez à la défense des Étendues lorsque le danger s'abattra sur elles. »
languages.original_text: "I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Expanse finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne conclus pas de marché, et jamais je ne me permettrais d'empiéter sur vos privilèges en vous donnant des ordres. Je ne fais que vous offrir des recommandations dans l'espoir que vous accourrez à la défense des Étendues lorsque le danger s'abattra sur elles. »

languages.text: "Ich treffe keine Abmachungen, und beim Imperator, ich gebe Euch keine Befehle – damit würde ich Eure Privilegien beschneiden. Ich biete lediglich gut gemeinte Empfehlungen an und erwarte, dass Ihr im Falle einer Bedrängnis für die Ausdehnung Eure eigenen Angelegenheiten pausiert und zu Hilfe eilt."
languages.original_text: "I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Expanse finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich treffe keine Abmachungen, und beim Imperator, ich gebe Euch keine Befehle – damit würde ich Eure Privilegien beschneiden. Ich biete lediglich gut gemeinte Empfehlungen an und erwarte, dass Ihr im Falle einer Bedrängnis für die Ausdehnung Eure eigenen Angelegenheiten pausiert und zu Hilfe eilt."

languages.text: "Ben anlaşma yapmam. İmparator sana emir vermemi yasakladığından böyle bir şey yapmam, imtiyazlarının ihlal etmem anlamına gelir. Ben yalnızca olumlu sonuçları olacak bazı önerilerde bulunuyor ve Enginlik tehlike altında kaldığında, şahsi meselelerini bir kenara bırakıp onun yardımına koşmanı bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I make no deals, and Emperor forbid that I give you orders — that would mean infringing on your privileges. I am merely offering well-meaning recommendations and expecting that, when the Expanse finds itself in danger, you will break away from your own affairs to heed them."

traits.locale_text: "Ben anlaşma yapmam ve İmparator sana emir vermemi yasaklıyor, böyle bir şey yapmam imtiyazlarının ihlal etmem anlamına gelir. Ben yalnızca olumlu sonuçları olacak bazı önerilerde bulunuyorum ve Enginlik kendini tehlike altında bulduğunda şahsi meselelerini bir kenara bırakıp onun yardımına koşmanı bekliyorum."
